lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Wong said the recent revision of the minimum liquid asset ratio to 18 pct allows banks to restructure liquid assets and inject more long term funds into the securities market.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dealers said a significant factor was that the t-bill and money market rate yield gap had narrowed, making rates for bills more competitive with those in the money market.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Tan Mong Tong, executive director of National Discount Co Ltd, told reporters the new securities market would enable banks, statutory bodies, insurance companies to manage their funds more flexibly.
